name: SepsisCrystalloidFluids
title: Sepsis Crystalloid fluids
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values represent crystalloid fluids.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients who are administered crystalloid fluids during an episode of severe sepsis or septic shock. Using the Quality Data Model, this particular element would map to the Medication category.),(Inclusion Criteria: Include intravenous crystalloid fluids only.),(Exclusion Criteria: Exclude codes that do not meet the inclusion criteria.)

concept.display: Calcium Chloride 0.0014 MEQ/ML / Potassium Chloride 0.004 MEQ/ML / Sodium Chloride 0.103 MEQ/ML / Sodium Lactate 0.028 MEQ/ML Injectable Solution
Calcium Chloride 0.0014 MEQ/ML / Potassium Chloride 0.024 MEQ/ML / Sodium Chloride 0.103 MEQ/ML / Sodium Lactate 0.028 MEQ/ML Injectable Solution

contains.display: calcium chloride 0.2 MG/ML / potassium chloride 0.3 MG/ML / sodium chloride 6 MG/ML / sodium lactate 3.1 MG/ML Injectable Solution
